Reflected DOMString attribute test for button/@id<br />
Initial value:<br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.id is ""</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.getAttribute("id") is null</span><br />
Setting a value via the IDL attribute:<br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.id = "foo"; element.id is "foo"</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.getAttribute("id") is "foo"</span><br />
Setting a value via the content attribute:<br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.setAttribute("id", " bar\n"); element.id is " bar\n"</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.getAttribute("id") is " bar\n"</span><br />
Setting null via the IDL attribute:<br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.id = null; element.id is "null"</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.getAttribute("id") is "null"</span><br />
Setting null via the content attribute:<br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.setAttribute("id", null); element.id is "null"</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.getAttribute("id") is "null"</span><br />
Setting undefined via the IDL attribute:<br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.id = undefined; element.id is "undefined"</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.getAttribute("id") is "undefined"</span><br />
Setting undefined via the content attribute:<br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.setAttribute("id", undefined); element.id is "undefined"</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.getAttribute("id") is "undefined"</span><br />
Setting non-string via the IDL attribute:<br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.id = 123; element.id is "123"</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.getAttribute("id") is "123"</span><br />
Setting non-string via the content attribute:<br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.setAttribute("id", 456); element.id is "456"</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> element.getAttribute("id") is "456"</span><br />
